item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (855 points | 268 comments)
2. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (114 points | 32 comments)
3. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (276 points | 226 comments)
4. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (36 points | 2 comments)
5. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (15 points | 2 comments)
6. Analyzing New Unique Identifier Formats (UUIDv6, UUIDv7, and UUIDv8) (38 points | 14 comments)
7. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (561 points | 93 comments)
8. First Greenhouse Gas Plumes Detected with NASA-Designed Instrument (54 points | 5 comments)
9. DuckStation (97 points | 40 comments)
10. PayPal (USA) will automatically share data about you to participating stores (140 points | 37 comments)
11. Machine learning and information theory concepts towards an AI Mathematician (73 points | 12 comments)
12. A mountain? Multistorey car park? Both? Inside Shanghai's £225M summit (8 points | discuss)
13. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What have researchers learned? (51 points | 16 comments)
14. IcePanel (YC W23) is hiring full stack engineers in Vancouver ( | hide)
15. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (377 points | 255 comments)
16. Putting a full power search engine in Ecto (119 points | 22 comments)
17. Ask HN: If you were rewriting Emacs from scratch, what would you do differently? (34 points | 72 comments)
18. Two never-before-seen tools, from same group, infect air-gapped devices (3 points | 2 comments)
19. Modded-NanoGPT: NanoGPT (124M) quality in 3.25B tokens (62 points | 4 comments)
20. Swarm, a new agent framework by OpenAI (197 points | 79 comments)
21. Turkish language has a gossip tense (121 points | 97 comments)
22. “Bad Apple” in Minecraft (341 points | 48 comments)
23. Six transplant patients in Brazil contract HIV from infected organs (140 points | 61 comments)
24. Entropy Explained, with Sheep (2016) (8 points | 3 comments)
25. The ACF plugin on the WordPress directory has been taken over by WordPress.org (245 points | 77 comments)
26. Choosing solitude (62 points | 52 comments)
27. Free Starship Booster catching arcade game (50 points | 15 comments)
28. AMD's Turin: 5th Gen EPYC Launched (295 points | 145 comments)
29. Tiny Drones Do Distributed Mapping (41 points | 2 comments)
30. Python and SysV Shared Memory (54 points | 5 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
